title: Tour de France tech: Intermarché-Circus-Wanty’s Cube bikes and a chat with Andre Greipel
content:
Hidden valves, upgraded derailleur pulleys, Rotor cranksets, and other goodies on the bikes of Biniam Girmay and Rui Costa.

Read the full article at Tour de France tech: Intermarché-Circus-Wanty’s Cube bikes and a chat with Andre Greipel on Velo.
author: Dave Everett
